group_1.textRight: The Witch's magic is coming from...the direction@of my house...

group_1.textLeft: It turns out that it may be related to the@Witch we killed, after all.

group_1.textRight: Do you think that maybe, everyone is already...
Oh, my dad is calling... [chara:103201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103201:cheek_0][chara:103201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:103201:lipSynch_1]Um, Lady San...

group_1.textLeft: A call at a time like this... You'd better answer it...
Um, Dad...?!

group_1.textRight: Miyu, what's going on with the Youth Association?

group_1.textLeft: I-I don't know either... When I went to the@community center, no one was there...
...Are they near you...?

group_1.textRight: Yes... They're sitting in front of the company,@apparently protesting the sponsorship issue...
It hasn't caused much of a stir yet, but@who knows when a riot might break out?

group_1.textLeft: Oh no...

group_1.textRight: San doesn't know anything about it?

group_1.textLeft: No... We've been searching for them together...

group_1.textRight: I see, then you should go back and stay@with her tonight.
It's not safe for you to come back now.

group_1.textLeft: O-okay...

group_1.textRight: We had reached an understanding about@the sponsorship, but...

group_1.textLeft: F-for now, I'll talk to Lady San.

group_1.textRight: Please take care.

group_1.textLeft: What was it...?

group_1.textRight: Everyone's protesting in front of my dad's company...
He said it's too dangerous to come back because@there might be a riot...

group_1.textLeft: It appears to be as I feared...
The Witch may be trying to incite a riot@and cause them to die...

group_1.textRight: Please don't say that, Lady San!

group_1.textLeft: I apologize.@[chara:103101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103101:cheek_0][chara:103101:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json][chara:103101:lipSynch_1]However, it seems we must make haste...

group_1.textRight: Y-yes!

group_1.textLeft: *Pant*...*Pant*...the magic response is...
It appears to be a little further...

group_1.textRight: Lady San, there was also a reaction from a@Magical Girl!

group_1.textLeft: This Witch is not something one can handle on@their own.
That girl likely doesn't possess the strength to do so,@either.

group_1.textRight: Oh, over there!
She went in?!

group_1.textLeft: That's far too reckless!
...However, that girl looks oddly familiar...
[chara:103101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: I can't believe we're chasing the same Witch.

group_1.textLeft: Didn't you all have another matter to address...?
Thank you for helping us, but...

group_1.textRight: You've got it wrong, seriously.
We've been working on our own thing.
We just happened to meet here by chance.
Have you seen any other Magical Girl...?
She's probably trying to take on this Witch@all by herself.

group_1.textLeft: One just entered the Labyrinth.

group_1.textRight: Crud...
We have to go save her...!

group_1.textLeft: Who is she?
Somehow, I have a feeling we've met before.

group_1.textRight: That's no surprise, honestly.

group_1.textLeft: Do you know what connection I have to that girl...?

group_1.textRight: Seriously, you don't remember? Mitsune Miwa.
Didn't you think that girl was Neo-Magius material?

group_1.textLeft: Mitsune...Miwa...
You're right...there was a girl like that...@We defeated a Witch together...

group_1.textRight: I also just remembered...
And on top of that, we thought we'd solved@the issue, but we didn't...

group_1.textLeft: We forgot everything about her...
...Right, that's what this feeling of discomfort is.

group_1.textRight: Mitsune's Doppel messed with everyone's heads.
And so, Mitsune is trying to redeem herself...

group_1.textLeft: ...by fighting this Witch all by herself...

group_1.textRight: Lady San!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, let's solve both of these problems together.

group_1.textRight: What happened to you two...?

group_1.textLeft: The Witch is manipulating everyone in the@Youth Association.
The festival is in danger!

group_1.textRight: 'Kay then, let's make you gals happy while@we're at it.
